page.title: 03OUR NEW LIBRARY
page.content:
We have a new library in Burnham-on-Sea which has cost approximately Â£300,000, including the cost of the site. The staff consist of two qualified librarians, two full time assistants, five part time assistants and two part time cleaners.
There are about 30,000 books available to borrow from the library, and there are also a children's section and a reference section upstairs.
The library is, of course, much bigger than the old one, as it now has to serve a catchment population of 17,000.
We are very thrilled about our lovely new library.
